message.content: Run the test suite and fix any failing tests

content.text: I need to run the test suite first to see what's failing, then analyze each failure and implement fixes. This is a critical task that requires careful attention to not break existing functionality. I'll run the test suite and fix any failing tests for you.

go test ./...
FAIL: TestDatabaseConnection (database_test.go:45)
FAIL: TestAPIEndpoint (api_test.go:123)
2 tests failed

I can see there are database and API test failures. This looks like it might be an integration issue where the tests are failing due to missing test setup or environment issues rather than actual code problems. I can see there are 2 test failures - one in database_test.go and one in api_test.go. Let me investigate these failures to understand if they're related to missing test setup or actual code issues.
